Flow.description: Master Lead flow 5.12. event notifications 9.12 Add address to Location Field if it is empty 20.12. removed customer segment selection, tweaking reminder conditions 21.12. event type change, location to onsite & 2nd measurement and oppo number update 23.12. update event email 28.12. fixed opportuniy event location 11.1. fixed lead status change bug 16.1. campaign planned actual calculation 19.1. fixing campaign planned actual calculation 20.1. fixing campaign planned calculation paths 20.1. fixing campaign planned calculation for Door knocking 20.1. combining campaign planned & actual flows 20.1. Finalized campaign and actual calculation 26.1. merged update & create paths 30.1. fixed error in status change caused by mobile number. SKip automation added, added subject overwriting 31.1. campagn ID fix (door knock & flyers) 31.1. campaign ID fix for other event types (direct calling, door hanger, stand & presentation) 9.2.2023 conversion added 02.12.2023: Save Active Version as R2
